column1: The Barbie movie is based on the eponymous fashion dolls by Mattel. The plot follows Barbie and Ken as they journey through both Barbieland and the real world following an existential crisis. Barbie grossed $1.446 billion worldwide
column2: making it the highest grossing films of 2023.

column1: The Super Mario Bros is based on Nintendo's Mario video game franchise. The plot follows a Brooklyn plumber named Mario who travels through the Mushroom Kingdom. The Super Mario Bros grossed $1.362 billion worldwide
column2: making it one of the second highest grossing films of 2023.

column1: Oppenheimer follows the life of J. Robert Oppenheimer
column2: the American theoretical physicist who helped develop the first nuclear weapons during World War II. Oppenheimer grossed over $976 million worldwide

column1: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3 follows the Guardians as they race to save the life of Rocket from his creator
column3: who is an alien scientist trying to perfect the universe. The film grossed over $845.6 million worldwide.

column1: In Fast X Toretto must protect his family from Dante Reyes (Momoa)
column2: who seeks revenge for his father’s death and the loss of his family’s fortunes. Fast X grossed over $704.875 million worldwide.

column1: The most popular shoe brand in Denmark is Ecco. Ecco is Denmark’s largest shoe brand and is available worldwide.
The most popular shoe brand in the United States is Nike. It’s followed by Adidas and New Balance in terms of popularity.
The most popular shoe brand in Europe EU is Adidas. Other popular shoe brands in Europe include Puma
The most popular shoe brand in China is Nike
column2: which accounted for approximately 9.5 percent of the market in 20221. Other popular shoe brands in China include Adidas

column1: The most famous cookie in Denmark is the Vaniljekranse. These are Danish vanilla butter cookies that are shaped into wreaths. Vaniljekranse are especially popular as Christmas cookies
column2: but you can find them in Denmark year-round.

column1: The most famous cookie in the United Kingdom is the Scottish Shortbread. This decadent biscuit is made with flour
column3: and a generous amount of butter
column5: crumbly texture with a melt-in-the-mouth feel.

column1: The most famous cookie in the United States is the Chocolate Chip Cookie. This classic American cookie is well balanced between salty and sweet in flavor
column3: and filled with small melting chocolate pyramids.

column1: The most famous cookie in Australia is the Anzac Biscuit. These sweet cookies are made from a combination of flour
column7: and soda bicarbonate. Both Australia and New Zealand claim to have invented Anzac biscuits.
